field.name: description
field.value:
Generating VB.Net code from the Active Records generator has the following issues * In a HasMany attribute like this: <HasMany(GetType(Case), Table:="t_case", ColumnKey:="Case_ID")> _ GetType(Case) does not include the namespace of the class, it should be GetType(Data.Case) This is also true in the delete, find and find all methods
* VB.Net is case in-sensitive. Therefore property block that have the same name as the parameter they wrap generate error messages since VB.Net cannot tell the difference between Param1 and param1
